pages.title: Smelter
pages.text: The <item>Smelter/$ is a heat powered furnace, with a minimum temperature of 200°C. It has a constant heat drain while above 200°C, regardless of whether it is running.$(br2)It smelts faster at higher temperatures, but has a higher heat drain. The efficiency does not change.

Even at the lowest working temperature, it is faster than a furnace.$(br2)<item>$(l:essentials:heat/cable)Heat cables/$ connect on the top. <thing>$(l:essentials/circuits)Circuits/$ measure the fullness of the item input, as a value from 0 to 15.$(br2)
